page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the Rofft School we did a survey to find out what jobs people in the area of Marford had.We went round the junior classes and asked the children what jobs their mother and father had. We found that none out of about two - hundred parents were unemployed.We found that there were more housewives in the area than any that worked in Marford or Chester.We also found that most people worked out of Marford and in Wrexham.The results were people who worked out of Marford sixty three; people who work in Wrexham sixty one; people who are housewives forty six; people who work in Chester twenty two;people who work in Marford twelve.
